title: Turn your iPad into a laptop with this 38 percent off this official Apple keyboard
content:
Macworld

Your iPad is pretty awesome on its own, but it’s going to be so much better once you attach a keyboard to it. And wouldn’t you know it, but we found the Apple Smart Keyboard on sale at Walmart for $98, down from its MSRP of $159. Now that’s a heavy discount!

This particular Apple Smart Keyboard will work with the 7th-, 8th-, and 9th-gen iPad as well as the 3rd-gen iPad Air and the 10.5-inch iPad Pro, all of which have a Home button. For newer models with Liquid Retina displays, the Smart Connector necessary to pair with the keyboard is in a different location.

This versatile keyboard will match your tablet perfectly, doubling as a slim and lightweight cover that will protect that gorgeous screen. With the power most of these iPads deliver, you’ll turn your tablet into a device that rivals laptops. Being able to type easily anywhere you go will make writing emails, presentations, and whatever else you need super easy. And since it folds up, it’ll also double as some extra protection for your iPad’s screen.

Frankly, by getting this keyboard for your iPad, you can leave your laptop at home for a couple of hours while you work out of a coffee shop, especially if you don’t have a super-heavy workload. And when it’s available for such a fantastic price, it would be a shame not to add the Apple Smart Keyboard to your cart.

The Apple Smart Keyboard is only $98 right now
